task: Open the AnkiDroid app's ManageSpace page.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu successfully navigates to the ManageSpace page.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "电话"
By touching the button labeled "电话" on the previous screen, the current screen now displays new textviews with educational content and buttons for starting and syncing with AnkiWeb.
Touch on a button that has text "开始"
Open the app again because the previous action led to closing the app

By touching the button with the text "开始," the user transitioned from the Introduction screen to the DeckPicker screen, where now there is a checked button for granting file management permissions and a new textview explaining the permission. (page changed from Introduction to DeckPicker)
Touch on a button

By touching on the button labeled "打开侧栏" in the DeckPicker screen, the current screen now displays additional buttons with resource IDs "button" and "fab_main," and new text views prompting to add cards using the "+" icon.
Touch on a button that has resource_id "button"
The button with resource_id "button" was touched, leading to a change in the screen content, where the text "AnkiDroid" was replaced with "登录到AnkiWeb" and new buttons for "取消" and "登录" appeared.
<1~2 sentences in one line, say "okay" if everything seems fine.>. <Start with "fufu needs to", and describe in one line. Say just "none" if fufu is doing well and no workaround is needed.>.
Touch on a button that has text "登录"

By touching the "登录" button, the user has navigated from the "DeckPicker" screen to the "MyAccount" screen where they can log in to their AnkiWeb account or create a new account. The screen now displays options for email and password entry, password reset, registration, and other account-related actions. (page changed from DeckPicker to MyAccount)
Fill a textfield that has text "电子邮件地址" with "2797195863@qq.com"
The textfield with the text "电子邮件地址" has been successfully filled with the email "2797195863@qq.com," and a "清除文字" button has appeared to clear the text if needed.
Fill a password textfield that has text "密码" with "20080808"
The user has successfully filled in the password field with a new password "20080808" in the MyAccount screen. The password textfield is now focused and contains the updated password.
Touch on a button that has text "登录"

By touching the button labeled "登录," the screen has transitioned from the "MyAccount" page to the "DeckPicker" page, where the interface now displays options for adding cards and managing collections. (page changed from MyAccount to DeckPicker)

The actions taken by fufu have been somewhat relevant to the task, but there seems to be a deviation in reaching the ManageSpace page. fufu needs to explore the "ImageButton" with content_description "更多选项" to potentially find a direct path to the ManageSpace page.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "更多选项"

After touching the button with content_desc "更多选项," the DeckPicker screen now displays additional buttons such as "检查," "恢复备份," "笔记类型," "导入牌组," and "导出," along with popup messages that briefly appeared and disappeared.
Touch on a button that has text "检查"
